entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 21. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:14 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning early in the evening and ending before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the evening and overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:14 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
